title: Why do any of the national fast-food chains (McDonalds, Burger King, etc) offer hot dogs for sale.
text:
Because of the amount of questions we receive on a daily basis, we can
only answer questions that relate to coastal North Carolina.

However, we can tell you that Hardees does offer hot dogs.
